title: French train hero Spencer Stone stabbed in Sacramento, in stable condition
text:
Published By: Contra Costa Times - Today 
Spencer Stone, one of three men hailed as heroes for thwarting a terrorist attack on a French train, was stabbed repeatedly during an assaul...
